Body:
self.MyTestRunner = pydev_runfiles.PydevTestRunner(pydev_runfiles.
    Configuration(files_or_dirs=path, include_tests=include_tests,
    verbosity=1, tests=tests, files_to_tests=files_to_tests, exclude_files=
    exclude_files, exclude_tests=exclude_tests, include_files=include_files))
self.files = self.MyTestRunner.find_import_files()
self.modules = self.MyTestRunner.find_modules_from_files(self.files)
self.all_tests = self.MyTestRunner.find_tests_from_modules(self.modules)
self.filtered_tests = self.MyTestRunner.filter_tests(self.all_tests)
